definition: grease/greasy food/oily/rich (of food)/fatty/greasy and dirty/a slippery character
tired of/fed up/sick/(of a person) to annoy/tiresome
bored/to be fed up with/sick and tired of sth
(of a couple) to be sweet to each other/lovey-dovey/variant of 膩味|腻味[ni4 wei5]

sentences.english: And make the duck breast not too oily.
sentences.chinese: 話梅酸酸好開胃，仲令鴨胸無咁膩。

sentences.english: Even banana cream pie gets tiresome if you have to eat it three times a day.
sentences.chinese: 就是香蕉冰激凌派，一天喫三次也會喫膩的。

sentences.english: She was so satiated with bananas that she would not even look at one.
sentences.chinese: 她喫香蕉喫膩了，現在對香蕉看都不願意看。

sentences.english: I am sick of eating cup-o'-noodles every day.
sentences.chinese: 我每天喫快餐面都喫膩了。

sentences.english: I'm sick of eating instant noodles everyday.
sentences.chinese: 每天喫速食麪讓我喫膩了。

sentences.english: I just never get tired of eating that and it gets in one of my fruit servings!
sentences.chinese: 我不會喫膩這種巧克力片，它已成爲水果餐中的一員。

sentences.english: I'm really sick of hospital food.
I nauseated about the food she cooked.
sentences.chinese: 我已喫膩了她燒出的飯菜。

sentences.english: Plum is sour and appetizing . And make the duck breast not too oily.
sentences.chinese: 話梅酸酸好開胃，仲令鴨胸無咁膩。

sentences.english: I felt bored with noodles. Shall we have a change today?
sentences.chinese: 我喫膩了麪條。我們今天換個口味如何？

sentences.english: I could eat this all day.
The students are bored with eating the same kind of box lunch every day.
sentences.chinese: 學生們每天喫同樣的盒飯喫膩了。

sentences.english: I 'm tired of eating that staff.
Sure. I'm bored of the Cafeteria.
sentences.chinese: 好啊，我喫膩了自助食堂。

sentences.english: The child is cloyed with sweets .
Yeah, i used to, too, but i got sick of it.
sentences.chinese: 是，我以前也這樣，但後來就喫膩了。
